channel.title: Possessor jumping to jailed target loses use
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was possessor and used the possess ability to attempt to jump to another. That person was jailed that night, so I got the standard message that I was prevented from visiting. After that, I could no longer use possess as it was out of uses.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The use should be refunded if it fails? At least, that's how I thought it was meant to work.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Get prince to jail someone. 2. Get possessor to use possess on the jailed person.
#### Comments: This might not actually be a bug, but I remember this sort of thing being in the patch notes previously.
